name: Deadland Forest
description:
A young man trapped in the wilderness, walking aimlessly with a sword protecting him from the dead man walking.  Can he survive just for 5 day until he get rescued ?

Game made for the Support Indie 2020 Game Jam

How to play : 

  • Left Click ( Mouse ) -> Move player to cursor position
  • Right Click ( Mouse ) -> Move sword to cursor position and attack dead man

Credit : Craftpix assets

#SupportIndie2020GameJam
